languages.text: {n}Тело в саркофаге неподвижно. Кажется, Хейнрикс не замечает происходящего вокруг — мутный взгляд устремлен мимо вас.{/n}
{n}The body inside the sarcophagus is not moving. Heinrix appears to have no awareness of his surroundings: his clouded gaze is directed past you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тело в саркофаге неподвижно. Кажется, Хейнрикс не замечает происходящего вокруг — мутный взгляд устремлен мимо вас.{/n}

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The body inside the sarcophagus is not moving. Heinrix appears to have no awareness of his surroundings: his clouded gaze is directed past you.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}棺の中の体は動かない。ハインリックスは周囲を意識していないように見える。彼の曇った視線はあなたを通り過ぎていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The body inside the sarcophagus is not moving. Heinrix appears to have no awareness of his surroundings: his clouded gaze is directed past you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}棺の中の体は動かない。ハインリックスは周囲を意識していないように見える。彼の曇った視線はあなたを通り過ぎていく。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}棺柩中的人一动不动。很显然，海因里希没有意识到周围发生了什么事情，他模糊的视线从你身边掠过。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The body inside the sarcophagus is not moving. Heinrix appears to have no awareness of his surroundings: his clouded gaze is directed past you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}棺柩中的人一动不动。很显然，海因里希没有意识到周围发生了什么事情，他模糊的视线从你身边掠过。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}El cuerpo del sarcófago no se mueve. Heinrix parece no ser consciente de lo que le rodea: su mirada nublada mira a través de ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The body inside the sarcophagus is not moving. Heinrix appears to have no awareness of his surroundings: his clouded gaze is directed past you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuerpo del sarcófago no se mueve. Heinrix parece no ser consciente de lo que le rodea: su mirada nublada mira a través de ti.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Körper in dem Sarcophagus bewegt sich nicht. Heinrix scheint sich seiner Umgebung nicht bewusst zu sein. Sein getrübter Blick geht an dir vorbei.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The body inside the sarcophagus is not moving. Heinrix appears to have no awareness of his surroundings: his clouded gaze is directed past you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Körper in dem Sarcophagus bewegt sich nicht. Heinrix scheint sich seiner Umgebung nicht bewusst zu sein. Sein getrübter Blick geht an dir vorbei.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le corps enfermé dans le sarcophage ne bouge pas. Heinrix ne semble pas conscient de ce qui l'entoure. Son regard voilé est fixé sur vous, mais c'est comme s'il ne vous voyait pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The body inside the sarcophagus is not moving. Heinrix appears to have no awareness of his surroundings: his clouded gaze is directed past you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le corps enfermé dans le sarcophage ne bouge pas. Heinrix ne semble pas conscient de ce qui l'entoure. Son regard voilé est fixé sur vous, mais c'est comme s'il ne vous voyait pas.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Lahdin içinde uzanan beden hareketsiz. Heinrix, çevresinden bihaber duruyor: Perde inmiş gözleriyle seni göremiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The body inside the sarcophagus is not moving. Heinrix appears to have no awareness of his surroundings: his clouded gaze is directed past you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lahidin içinde uzanan beden hareketsiz. Heinrix, çevresinden bihaber duruyor: Perde inmiş gözleriyle seni göremiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
